title: Rockets GM should learn free speech has limits
text:
chinadaily.com.cn | Updated: 2019-10-10 08:44

Editor's note: Daryl Morey, the Houston Rockets' general manager, infuriated Chinese fans by tweeting on Sunday an image that read "Fight for Freedom. Stand with Hong Kong" in support of radical protesters in Hong Kong, sparking a wave of criticism online. Here, China Daily readers share their opinions.

cdappRflBcZ (China)

Fight for freedom. Does the Houston GM know how much freedom HK has? Freedom of the press, religion, speech, travel, peaceful protest, pursuit of happiness, education, employment, health care, sports, justice & laws, entertainment. However there is no freedom to violate the law, terrorize the people, attack the police, vandalize metro, airport, malls, restaurants and legislature. Cannot believe how ignorant the GM is!
